channel.title: HKG:6666 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:6666 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: China’s Property Crisis Hits New Low With Evergrande Delisting
item.description: China Evergrande Group’s delisting marks a bleak milestone for the nation’s property sector, now in a fourth year of paralysis that continues to weigh down the world’s second-largest economy.
